name: UpdateEventProperty
description:
Update a property in a custom event definition.

This tool updates an existing property within a specified custom event definition in Hubspot. It should be called when there is a need to modify the property of an event.

parameters.name: custom_event_name
parameters.description: The internal name of the custom event to be updated. Required to identify which event's property is being modified.

value_schema.description: The internal name of the custom event.

parameters.name: property_name_to_update
parameters.description: The internal name of the property to update within the event definition.

value_schema.description: The internal name of the property to update.

parameters.name: property_update_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing updates for the property. Includes options for enumerated properties, description, and label.

options.description: A list of available options for the property if it is an enumeration. NOTE: This field is only applicable for enumerated properties.

description.description: A description of the property that will be shown as help text in HubSpot.

label.description: Human readable label for the property. Used in HubSpot UI

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Hubspot Events API

parameters.name: eventName
parameters.description: The internal name of the custom event.

value_schema.description: The internal name of the custom event.

parameters.name: propertyName
parameters.description: The internal name of the property to update.

value_schema.description: The internal name of the property to update.

options.description: A list of available options for the property if it is an enumeration. NOTE: This field is only applicable for enumerated properties.

description.description: A description of the property that will be shown as help text in HubSpot.

label.description: Human readable label for the property. Used in HubSpot UI

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
